name: OtherBall
description:
How Many Balls Could You Hold on the Screen?

A Fun and Challenging 2D Game, Where You Protagonist a Slime Being Attacked by Canons of Tennis Balls!

But!...  How much could you dodge them?

You Have 5 Lives to Beat Your Record, Or Maybe You See A Friend's Record!

Press [W] [A] [S] [D] to Move the Slime!!

Press [F10] to Save a Screenshot and So You Can Share It With Your Friends!!

Screenshots are saved in:

C:\Users\ [NameUser] \AppData\Roaming\OtherBall\Screenshots
